resources.string:
Hi, my name is Holly. 

I love meat. 

The kind that is alive and swims around in an aquarium or river, or lake, and definitely the ocean. 
Fun fact is that I have several aquariums and also river. 

I like eating meat, too. Raw meat. Grilled meat. Smoked meat. Poached meat - not so much. 
And sometimes I even go fishing. 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. 

Once, when I was camping in Canada, and very hungry, I even caugth a large salmon with my hands. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own aquarium. 
You should ask someone else about fishing,tough.
